question: Do i own my 0001 home outright?
answer: When you buy a 0001 home, you own the title in the traditional way. If you need, we’ll help you find the right mortgage and can recommend real estate lawyers. You keep full legal ownership of your home, with the added benefit that you can spend time in other locations whenever you want.

question: Does furniture come included?
answer: Yes, each new home comes fully furnished and equipped so that you can move in easily with just your suitcase. Each interior is designed for flexibility and functionality and we work directly with designers from our community to source pieces often straight from their studios.

question: Can i change the design of my home?
answer: Legally you own your home and are free to do what you want with it. However, to maintain access to home0001's network in other locations, your home does need to meet our standards and our team can support you in making changes where desired.

question: Are you open to negotiation on price?
answer: No. The practice of negotiation has been shown to systemically disadvantage certain buyer groups, and bidding wars can pit buyers against each other and drive prices up unreasonably. We research the market meticulously and negotiate the best price for our community based on comparable homes sold recently. And by representing a large community of buyers, we’re able to negotiate discounts on entire buildings from developers.

question: Do i need a broker?
answer: You don't need a real estate broker to buy an 0001 home. We’re licensed to guide you through the process from beginning to end. You can use your own mortgage broker, real estate attorney, etc., or we can intro you to good people to work with.

question: Can i buy a home as a non-us citizen?
answer: The process for buying an 0001 home is the same wherever you’re from. There's no extra stamp duty, taxes, or any other additional costs for non-us citizens.

question: Are 0001 homes co-ops or condos?
answer: The majority of 0001 homes (including all 0001 homes in new york) are legally condominiums, so you take full ownership of the deed. In los angeles our townhomes are single-family homes.

question: Can i rent out my 0001 home?
answer: You’re free to rent out your home in accordance with local laws and building rules.

question: Can i sell my 0001 home?
answer: You can sell your home however you like, whenever you like—you own the title. Work with a broker of your choice, or use our resale service to simplify the process.

question: How do i book an 0001 home somewhere else?
answer: Whenever you want to spend time in other home0001 locations, just text us your dates and we'll confirm availability right away. You cover one cleaning fee each time you swap homes and don't pay any nightly rates. 0001 homes are fitted with smart locks, so you can gain access to your new place with your phone. You’ll be invited to any community events that are taking place locally and you’ll have continual access to our virtual concierge service so you can text us whenever you need anything.

question: Do i have to make my home available?
answer: No. There's no requirement to make your home available to other members when you’re away, unless you want to make use of our homes in other locations for free during that time.

question: Do you guarantee availability?
answer: We aim to have somewhere available whenever members want to spend time at any of our locations, and we keep additional homes in each location so that members can swap locations more easily. However, we don’t guarantee availability.

question: Can i return home anytime?
answer: If you need to return home while another member is staying at your place, we’ll offer you the best alternative we have for the interim. Or if you decide that you really need to return to your own place, our membership agreement gives you precedence and we will help relocate the member who had been staying at your home to the best alternative.

question: What about storage?
answer: Each 0001 home comes with secure, lockable wardrobes and plenty of other thoughtfully designed storage space. And if necessary we can help coordinate additional storage either in your building or in a nearby storage facility and arrange for items to be picked up and dropped off in sync with your travel dates.

question: What if somebody damages my stuff?
answer: We'll notify you right away in case any issues arise while another member is staying in your home. Our comprehensive home swap insurance covers any damages to your personal belongings caused by other members, so you can rest easy when you're away.

question: Are pets allowed?
answer: While we love animals, whether pets are allowed in a particular property is up to the owner of each home. Members with a qualifying disability needing to bring their pet are welcome to get in touch with us so that we can find them suitable properties.

question: What about plant care?
answer: Each time you swap locations we share instructions on how to care for the specific plants in your new home. You can text us anytime if you have questions.

question: How do i book an 0001 home somewhere more expensive?
answer: Whenever you want to swap locations, you’ll be offered a home that most closely matches the value of your own. If you’re swapping to a significantly more expensive area for extended periods, you may need to pay an additional fee.

question: When will home0001 be in my location?
answer: 0001 homes are currently available in los angeles and new york city, with paris, berlin, london, mexico city, and a number of rural locations coming next. If there's somewhere else in the world you'd like to live, send us a message and we'll let you know if it's on the horizon so you can have first access.

question: How does buying a 0001 home differ from the traditional home buying process?
answer: When you buy a 0001 home, you own the title on your individual home in the traditional way (so you can qualify for a regular mortgage). It's not a timeshare or a rental—it's exactly like owning any other home. We guide you through the purchase process, from choosing the right home, to obtaining financing, to moving in and getting to know your neighbors. Selling directly to our community without expensive brokers’ fees means that we can put everything into creating an extraordinary experience for homebuyers – with access to 0001 homes in other locations and beautifully designed interiors at no additional cost.

question: What comes included with a 0001 home?
answer: From furniture to tableware, linens to toiletries, and pantry essentials to houseplants, each new 0001 home comes fully equipped. Every single thing in a 0001 home is thoughtfully designed with a focus on simplicity and functionality, so homebuyers can move in with nothing but their suitcase.

question: How does the home0001 network work?
answer: Each 0001 home is a node in an expanding network. Homeowners get free access to homes in other locations, so you can spend time in other places as often as you like and make your home available to other members of the collective while you’re away. You’ll pay one cleaning fee each time and no nightly rate. Each 0001 home has plenty of secure storage. We take care of the practicalities and keep additional homes in each location for extra flexibility.

question: Do i have to make my 0001 home available, and can i rent out or sell my 0001 home?
answer: You own your home. You're in control. If you don’t want your place to be available to other 0001 homeowners while you’re away, that’s fine—you just won’t be able to make use of other 0001 homes during that time. You’re also free to rent out your home (in accordance with local laws and building rules). And you can sell your home however you like, whenever you like—you own the title. Work with a broker of your choice or use our resale service to simplify the process.

question: What do i get when i join the home0001 community?
answer: Home0001's community is built on collaboration. From prioritizing new locations and proposing amenities and features, to shaping our events program in each city, members can contribute to the evolution of the collective through discussions both online and over dinner in each of our locations.

question: What is the history of 48 allen street?
answer: Built in 1900 as a haberdashery and factory warehouse for rubenstein & lipton, this 7-story steel and brick tenement building at 48 allen was turned into a chinese evangelical church in 1998 with the expansion of chinatown’s fuzhou community. When the church of the living lord moved to a bigger premises on eldridge, the building was converted into home0001's artist-led housing collective.

question: Who is behind home0001?
answer: Home0001 is initiated by a multi-disciplinary collective working across art, architecture, technology, and design, and currently based in los angeles, new york, paris, berlin, and london. Designed together with world renowned architects, 0001 homes are fully equipped and furnished and are part of an expanding network.

question: What is the design history of 0001 homes?
answer: Individually owned and collaboratively connected, 0001 homes are designed for flexibility over time. An improvisation on somewhat lost histories of constructivist architecture, each 0001 home is configured using industrial components and designed to prioritize multi-functional utility.

question: What is the history of elysian park and echo park?
answer: This series of newly-built townhomes in echo park are close to both elysian park and the heart of the echo park neighborhood on sunset boulevard. Once known as rock quarry hills, the steep canyons of elysian park were considered undesirable development land. But the dawn of the last century would see echo park, home to la’s first film studios, become the center of the silent film industry and the surrounding hills began to be sold off to developers to be built up. However a successful preservation campaign resulted in the protection of 600 acres of this beautiful, desolate landscape, with 150,000 trees planted in elysian park through the 1880s and 90s, including oaks, pines, cypresses, cedars and eucalyptus. Neighboring this park, one of its foothills is now home to artist-led housing collective, home0001.

question: What happens when i purchase a 0001 home in los angeles?
answer: Homebuyers purchasing an 0001 home in los angeles get free access to 0001 homes in other cities too, while making their home available to other members of the collective when they’re away. Home0001 organizes the practicalities and keeps additional homes in each location for greater flexibility.

question: How does the home0001 network function?
answer: Home0001 is a distributed housing collective: in addition to community dinners and events, homeowners get access to 0001 homes in other cities for free. No nightly rate; just a cleaning fee each time. Own one home; live flexibly between multiple locations.

question: Who founded home0001?
answer: Home0001 is a new form of housing initiated by a collective of architects, artists, technologists, and designers currently based in los angeles, new york, paris, rotterdam, berlin, and london.

question: What differentiates the home0001 buying process?
answer: When you buy an 0001 home, you own the title on your individual home in the traditional way (so you can qualify for a regular mortgage). It's not a timeshare or a rental—it's exactly like owning any other home. We guide you through the purchase process, from choosing the right home, to obtaining financing, to moving in and getting to know your neighbors. Selling directly to our community without expensive brokers’ fees means that we can put everything into creating an extraordinary experience for homebuyers – with access to 0001 homes in other locations and beautifully designed interiors at no additional cost.

question: What does a 0001 home come with?
answer: From furniture to tableware, linens to toiletries, and pantry essentials to houseplants, each new 0001 home comes fully equipped. Every single thing in an 0001 home is thoughtfully designed with a focus on simplicity and functionality, so homebuyers can move in with nothing but their suitcase.

question: What size apartments are available at the lower east side townhouse? what amenities are included?
answer: Home0001’s new lower east side warehouse conversion offers 2-bedroom, 1-bedroom and studio apartments across six floors with a large elevator and roof deck.

question: What size apartments are available at the echo park townhouses? what amenities are included?
answer: Home0001’s newly-built 3-story townhouses in echo park can be configured with either three bedrooms or an office and / or a gym—and each home has its own 2-car garage.

question: What does each 0001 home come equipped with?
answer: From furniture to cookware, linens to audio equipment, and pantry essentials to houseplants, each 0001 home comes fully equipped with everything you need, ready from day one.

question: Are 0001 homes move-in ready?
answer: Developed in collaboration with world-renowned architects, every single thing in an 0001 home is thoughtfully designed with a focus on simplicity and functionality, so homebuyers can literally move in with nothing but their suitcase.

question: How does the home0001 network work?
answer: Homeowners get free access to homes in other locations, so you can spend time in other places as often as you like and make your home available to other members of the collective while you’re away.

question: How do i prepare my 0001 home before a swap?
answer: You’ll pay one cleaning fee each time and no nightly rate. Each 0001 home has plenty of secure storage. We take care of the practicalities and keep additional homes in each location for extra flexibility.

question: What does each 0001 home come equipped with?
answer: You’ll pay one cleaning fee each time and no nightly rate. Each 0001 home has plenty of secure storage. We take care of the practicalities and keep additional homes in each location for extra flexibility.

question: What are the perks of joining the home0001 network?
answer: Home0001 is a distributed housing collective: in addition to community dinners and events, homeowners get access to 0001 homes in other cities for free. No nightly rate; just a cleaning fee each time. Own one home, live in many places.

question: What is home0001?
answer: Home0001 is a global housing network. Each 0001 home is fully-equipped and furnished. Move in with just your suitcase. Swap cities whenever you like.

question: What's home0001?
answer: Home0001 is a housing co-op where you buy a home designed by oma (they’re a legendary architecture studio you should look them up) and you own the home the normal way (it's not a timeshare or a rental) and then you can stay in a bunch of other locations whenever you want (right now ny and la). Heres what it is in more details: we design insanely dope homes with oma. We furnish all the homes with everything you would need. From the shelving the furniture to the cutlery and the soap. And the furniture is modular too so you can rearrange stuff super easily. And we sell the homes at market price with the furnishing included. Once you buy the home and sign the papers you can move in the next day.

question: Do i fully own my 0001 home?
answer: When you buy a 0001 home you own it the normal way. You can do whatever you want with it. Buy it. Sell it. Renovate it. It's not a timeshare or some bs rental scheme. You own the title to the home. It's yours.

question: Can i stay in other 0001 homes at any time?
answer: You can stay in other locations whenever you want. If you keep your home to meet some basic specifications (like, our basic design scheme) then you can stay in other home0001 homes.  because we design all the interiors all the homes kind of feel like your home and swapping locations is really easy. Right now we’re in two cities: la and ny. If you buy a ny home you can stay in la whenever you want. And vice versa. Basically two homes for the price of one.

question: What cities are 0001 homes available in?
answer: Eventually you'll have a home to stay in whenever you want in nearly every city on earth. Next year we’ll open in paris, london, berlin, and mexico city. And then more and more places. Eventually you'll have a home to stay in a ton of cities on earth.

question: How do i buy a 0001 home?
answer: You can only get one of our homes if you join our waitlist. So if you want one now, or if you want one later when we open a 0001 home in your location, join the waitlist. It's on our website.

question: What's the gist of home0001?
answer: 0001 homes are furnished & fully equipped. Move in with nothing. Swap cities any time.

question: What cities will 0001 homes be available in?
answer: Each 0001 home is a node in an expanding network: new york, los angeles, london, paris, berlin, mexico city
